About Me

Hi! I'm Lisa, a frontend developer who recently graduated from the frontend degree in the Netherlands, FDND

More About Me

I enjoy building accessible and user-friendly websites. I have experience with writing semantic HTML, modern CSS, JS, and a few JS frameworks.
